name: sipgate-rest-api-client-v2
description: Client for the sipgate rest api v2

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src -d dist
scripts.check-master: branch_name=$(git symbolic-ref -q HEAD); branch_name=${branch_name##refs/heads/}; branch_name=${branch_name:-HEAD}; test "$branch_name" = "master" || (echo Current branch is $branch_name instead of master && exit 1)
scripts.check-clean-working-tree: git_status=$(git status -s); test -z "$git_status" || (echo Working tree is dirty && exit 1)
scripts.preversion: echo ::: preversion && npm run check-master && npm run check-clean-working-tree
scripts.prepublish: echo ::: prepublish && npm run check-master && npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.postversion: echo ::: postversion && npm run check-master && git push

author: sipgate
